entries.femaleVariant: This is a meditation of the Earth element.
Spirit of nature, Mother Earth, I send you greetings. We are of one blood – I am you, you are me.
Cleanse my body and soul from pain, sickness, impurity and the negative energy from negative people, worlds and dimensions.
Give me the energy of life – give me health, youth, wisdom, knowledge, strength, joy, happiness and inner peace.
We sense joy, tranquility, lightness, purity – our heart and soul.
Warmth and joy surrounds us. Our legs absorb the earth's energy, filling every cell of our bodies. Our souls and spirits are cleansed.
We thank you, Mother Earth, with our mind, body and soul. There is no life without you, or the other elements.
We walk the earth, through meadows, nature in full bloom.
O, Mother Earth, I and all other creatures from you created.
We remove our shoes, feel our bare feet touch the soil. We absorb the earth's energy.
We walk the earth – a butterfly rests on blooming flower, bees are gathering nectar.
